definition: to speak in a low muffled voice (idiom)
pottery container for water, wine etc
pottery container for water, wine etc
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: The headmaster's voice boomed(out) across the playground.
sentences.chinese: 校長甕聲甕氣的聲音傳遍操場。
